div.h1: Ferris Independent School DistrictEducating Students. Enriching Lives.

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

p.span:
We want to thank you for visiting our district website. We hope this will be a great place to find information, resources, and give you a sense of what it is like to be a part of the Ferris ISD family.
We are honored you have entrusted us with your children's educational development. If there is anything we can do to support you, please let us know.

Ferris ISD is proud to be a partner with the City of Ferris in securing a brighter future for our community. We understand the vital role education plays in the strength and vitality of our country; and we are committed to providing our young people with educational and extra-curricular opportunities that will foster their growth and development. From the classroom to the gridiron and from the band hall to the ag farm, our Yellowjackets are sharpening their skills to compete on a world stage.

div.div: Congratulations to the music programs of the Ferris ISD Fine Arts! During the month of February, the student musicians of Ferris High School competed at the UIL Regional Solo and Ensemble Contest.

p.span:
Thank you for being a part of our school district. We look forward to another great year and hope nothing but the best for you and your family during this school year. Please help us, as a community, to strive to be the best in all we do. Parents and students must be active members of a school district to make it a success. We want to be the best and we want you to help us be the best. Through our combined efforts we will help ensure that your child is ready for college and the work force.
Partnerships help bring about change and progress. We hope that you, your teacher, your school, and our entire school district can work together to make our students well-rounded, productive citizens. Our staff looks forward to a great year working with you for your child's success!
Sincerely,
The Ferris ISD Leadership Team

span.style: margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 18px;
letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Hind Guntur; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

span.span: We are committed to providing a stimulating learning environment. Students in Ferris ISD need to know that they are loved, valued, and appreciated by district leadership and our support team. Being able to talk directly with the students and hear their first-hand perspective is one of the very best parts of my job.
